Text: Thank You for the upload!  As an appreciation, how might I provide you with about 300 titles already converted to M4B format so you can redistribute?

@neshaminy - thanks for the feedback.

how to distribute 300 titles in M4B format?

make your first torrent! 
are they DRM'd?
maybe post em up on a file sharing site and share the link here... 
or just post a link to the torrent you make...
